description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5gmt2","text":"DNA Extraction of fecal samples with the MagMAX Microbiome Kit from Applied Biosystems.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ajlv","text":"Prepare your workspace","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k3ch","text":"a.     Turn on Biological Safety Cabinet blower, white light, and window alarm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1r63","text":"b.     Clean the cabinet with 70% ethanol, including the work surface, walls, and glass.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bju5v","text":"c.     Lower the sash and run the UV light for 15 minutes.                                              ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"46fmd","text":"     i.     Do not trust the glass to protect you from UV exposure. You can be in a different part of the lab while it is running, but do not loiter in front of the cabinet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2falv","text":"d.     Switch the UV light back to white light; you are ready to begin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pdh4","text":"e.     Clean all materials with 70% ethanol before putting them into the cabinet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"307j5","text":"Gather Materials","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fage","text":"You can use the small projector cart to hold materials and your notes next to the cabinet. {"blocks":[{"key":"81o66","text":"1. Turn on the KingFisher Flex (the on switch is on the bottom left of the machine).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3kqpf","text":"2. Push the right arrow to select \"user\" then the down arrow to select \"DNA.\" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"banvg","text":"3. Push the down arrow until you reach \"MagMAX_Microbiome_Stool_Flex\" and then press \"Start.\"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5084l","text":"4. Load your prepared plates onto the machine following the prompts on the screen. Press the \"Start\" button to                 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"djhal","text":"    advance to the next steps. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"963te","text":"        a. BE SURE THAT THE PLATE IS ORIENTED CORRECTLY, with the A1 corner of the plate. matching the A1 labeled ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2tkoa","text":"            on the KingFisher plate dock. Make sure the plate is sitting perfectly flat and not at a slight angle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78cn","text":"5. Once all plates are loaded, press \"Start\" to begin the protocol. Record usage in the logbook next to the machine. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4r2sk","text":"6. After the program completes, you will be prompted to unload your plates the same way you loaded them. Keep the ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ots1","text":"    Elution plate, seal with fresh plate film, and store at 4C for short term. If you are storing for longterm, transfer the ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ca6oo","text":"    DNA from the Elution plate to non-stick DNA tubes and store in -80C. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2v2nc","text":"7. All other plates can be discarded in the biohazard waste bin. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ds6rl","text":"8. Turn off the KingFisher and wipe with DNA away. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
